text: The Enchanted Shield is imbued with powerful magic that bestows a bevy of protective boons to the wielder's entire army.
The Shield of Ptolos is magically inscribed with a myriad of distracting patterns and designs. The patterns magically deflect arrows and bolts, sending them spinning off of their intended course.
This mighty sword has runes inscribed along the blade by a Bright Mage. A fireball may be cast from the sword once per Magic Cycle.
When ingested, this magic potion increases the strength of the bearer's regiment for a short period of time, allowing them to inflict far more damage on enemy troops in melee
The sound of this horn strikes fear into the hearts of enemies, yet calm the hearts of your allies..

Engrol Goldtongue is the official Dwarf Envoy from the fortress of Zhufbar. His skills in diplomacy are unusually proficient for a Dwarf and he has resolved many quarrels with the Empire in his career which spans over two centuries.
Upkeep incraise: %+n% for non regiments of renown and mercenaries
Cost incraise: %+n% for non regiments of renown and mercenaries

This mighty sword has runes inscribed along the blade by a Bright Mage. In hand-to-hand combat the wielder strikes more accurately and ferociously against his enemies. In addition, a devastating fireball may be cast from the sword. Morgan Bernhardt has named his entire mercenary army after this great artifact.
The Enchanted Shield is imbued with powerful magic that bestows a bevy of protective boons to the wielder's entire army.
This hallowed banner has been infused with power and can lash the enemy with bolts of pure energy. It may be cast, unleashing up to six mighty lightning bolts upon enemy troops within range
This hallowed banner has been infused with power and can lash the enemy with bolts of pure energy. It may be cast, unleashing up to six mighty lightning bolts upon enemy troops within range

This mighty sword channels Celestial magic through its blade. In hand-to-hand combat a successful strike wounds the enemy automatically, regardless of any armour he may be wearing. When the wielder is in melee it may be cast once per magic cycle, summoning multiple lightning bolts from the sky which strike the enemy regiment.
